title: Ticket #6283: condor_submit should still check proxy expiration
description:
In 8.5.8, we changed it so that the schedd reads the proxy file for setting x509 attributes in the job ad (instead of condor_submit). An unintended side-effect was that condor_submit no longer checked whether the proxy was expired (and failing with an error if true). We should restore that feature of condor_submit.

The expiration check was still performed when submitting to a pre-8.5.8 schedd. For #6258, the check was removed entirely.
